BonusSpellFeature.Name: Sea Twins’ Gift
BonusSpellFeature.Text: The Sea Twins rule seas in the Feywild. Their gift allows you to travel through water with ease. You can breathe underwater, and you gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed. You can also cast water breathing using a warlock spell slot. Once you cast it using this invocation, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.
